title: American Horror Story 8: Apocalypse // 4 DAYS (elsa's freak show burning)
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: I'm thinking the previous locations won't be mentioned, but these clips are just to put it in our minds that every location we've come to know and love is utterly decimated.
Surprised the theme park is still standing until now. Maybe as a way of paying tribute to Dandy’s victims?

Everyone is misinterpreting the Promo. Nothing is going to be ruined I think it's just to show that the Apocalypse is going to connect all these seasons together and we'll get our crossover with Jessica Lange
Could you please not destroy all of our favourite places? That'd be great.
I am the only one that think this REALLY Sad?
